skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.
The same enchanted mist that obscures Fimir Balefiend dwellings can also be conjured to confound and horrify would-be attackers on the battlefield.
Strange talismans and mouldy bone charms of the fens can often carry unique and unforeseen boons and side effects.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

Missile resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: They can see the Winds of Magic's ebb and flow, enabling them to make the best use of the magical power available.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: For some, deathly agony is what awakens true power. They bleed willingly to conjure storms no mortals should wield.
Do not underestimate the strength of a battle-hardened warrior-sorcerer, for a Champion can fall to one gifted in sorcery in many ways.
Intrinsically connected to the Chaos-infused lands of their dwelling, the very earth responds to their will.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 5%
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 15

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Why forlorn? Are you not a king, an emperor â€“ a champion?"

effects.description: Hero self-defence: -5% chance of wounding aggressors

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A calming presence can be a steadying handâ€¦ but also disquieting.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.
Such an ugly scar is always memorable.
Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.
Skulk and sneak or shadow and stalk, theirs is a guileful nature.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Shares the intellect of a River Troll.

effects.description:
All Climate penalties are nullified
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
All Dirach possess a natural talent for magic, but this oneâ€™s raw potential allows him to act as a living conduit for the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

Missile strength: +5% for Balefiend Apprentices units
	(all units in army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(all armies factionwide)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Dirach is a master of Fidchell, a complex board game beloved among their kind. Though its rules seem tedious and opaque to outsiders, it demands sharp intellect and ruthless cunning to win.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
